Detailed Description

This class is used in a custom implementation of wxThreadHelper.

The reason for not using wxThreadHelper are as follows:

  • wxThreadHelper makes use of wxThread:Kill, which is warned against serveral times in the docs, and even calls it in its destructor.
  • Managing the thread-object is difficult, since the only way to destroy it is to create a new thread.
The documentation for this class was generated from the following file:
  • src/ThreadScheduler.cpp
